alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 4:58PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the main canyon, and 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts in high elevation portions of the park. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
